title: Special Operations Officer Job at PPC Limited
content:
PPC (formerly Phlips Project Centre) is a wjolly Nigerian-owned multi-compentency engineering and infrastructure development company. its core activites are primarily geered towards providing specialized end-to-end services for projects in ICT, Power, Healthcare, Transportation, Building Services and other utility sectors.
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Commencing operations in 1991 as Philips Projects Centre, an affiliate of Philips Electronics N.V. of the Netherlands. The PPC acronym was retained after a strategic management buyout of the Dutch parent company. Thus, with this strategic buyout, the old businessrs were retained, with the added advantage of the exclusive distributorship of the numerous professional Philips' products, and the provision of integrayed solutions based on cutting-edge technology.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Special Operations Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Performance reporting and monitoring
	Compliance: Secure and enforce Quality standards
	Secure relevant certifications, professional/ corporate memberships, registration and renewals (including audits)
	Internal Customer Satisfaction: Co-ordinate performance review meeting with EC, MD, Heads of verticals and shared services + company’s legal representative


Requirements


	Education: Bsc, Msc
	Professional Qualification Membership of relevant professional bodies – NIM, et


Key Competencies Requirements:


	IT Savy, Analytical mind
	Team Player, Ability to work under pressure & able to multitask.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: hr@ppcng.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
